name: SaintoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, open saint of the day.”
”Alexa, ask saint of the day who is today's saint?”
”Alexa, ask saint of the day who is the patron saint of fishermen?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saint of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des: Saint of the day by Franciscan Media allows you to simply ask "Who is today's saint?" and will provide the name and audio description of the saint of the day. You can also ask for a saint for a particular date or cause (aka patron saint).
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
